nodes.excerpt: I am exceptionally pedantic about my git commits. However, since I started using git locally, I have become much more relaxed. I put on my headphones, blast some Metallica, get in the zone, and git commit like a mad person! It is a great place to be. Furiously coding and committing at an important juncture. However, this led me into bad habits. Reckless is a better word for it. I generally commit with a descriptive message, and push at logical times… but have gotten less precise lately. I have…

frontmatter.title: How to Reset and Revert Git Commits
frontmatter.description: Short tutorial of how to turn back time with Git commits.
